title: FS (Price lowered) - A pair of SGC graded Mayo N300's
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Price lowered) - A pair of SGC graded Mayo N300's
posts.post_content:
For Sale (Price lowered) - Always difficult to find Mayo N300's both SGC graded.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residens add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.

N300 Tom Lovett SGC 1 - $330 venmo or zelle, $342 if you prefer pp gs.

N300 Herman Long SGC 1 - $330 venmo or zelle, $342 if pp gs.
